p: RT-qPCR analysis detected YFV RNA in the serum and whole blood collected from RJ155 (mean of CT value = 19.7); this diagnosis was further confirmed by sequencing the complete genome of YFV (GenBank accession number: MK533792). However, the 278 mosquitoes (one Haemagogus janthinomys, two Hg. leucocelaenus, five Sabethes albiprivus, 15 Ae. albopictus, and 255 Ae. scapularis) collected at the Morro de São João a small-time interval after the notification alert for the dying monkey tested negative for YFV.
